Articles.Content:
Made a simple video where i try to get to the moon I am not sure if it is the right way but it gets me there was very little fuel.

http://youtu.be/57O91JPip2c
Are using the 'Shotball' Liquid Boosters considered cheating?
This is not really about cheating or not cheating. it is about the methods used to get to the moon with very few burns.
well in that case try the shotball boosters, they are almost too powerful. If that is even possible in KSP
